title: Can a zombie live without blood? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on the rules of the fictional scenario. Zombiism isn’t as well-established in lore as vampirism—which would be a condition most would agree requires occasional fresh influxes of blood—but even the aspects of that condition aren’t as clear or consistent from story to story. You should ask the author of the zombie story you’re referring to. Only they can tell you with any authority (and then, only for their works).
